The impact of the internet on our daily life

Sep 27 2008 | WordPressBackup

Azalea is having some fun in Maryland. She just took a photo using the iPhone, then sent it to her blog as a post by the app which developed by WordPress.

Two minutes ago, I saw a new message on MY FriendFeed page, indicating the update of her blog as I just said. Then I clicked the message, redirected to the post and added a comment .

The whole interaction between us is done within 3 minutes. She shared a photo with all of the visitors of her blog, including me. I left a feedback and got a vivid impression of her journey. We didn't even contact each other directly. This is the impact of the internet on our daily life.

Amazing, isn't it?
